resources.string: You cannot divide an odd number by two
You cannot divide this number by three
"I'm sure you don't need a number this big"

As the name says, your objective in this gamemode is to get from a bigger number down to one. You can try setting highscores for either time or number of moves or both for different given number of digits.
"Here you have to find a way to get from one number to another. Time doesn't matter, so minimize the number of operations you do."

"As in Down To One you have to get to one as fast as possible (wether in terms of time or moves is up to you). But this time the number you multiply and divide by is three!\n\nBe warned: this way it's harder"

"Mathematics:
 Eric Angelini (Brussels, Belgium)

App Developement:
 Doim

Thanks to my testers:

Thank you for playing my first game ever!"
